name: Covidwise
desc: A site built to allow users to check the most up-to-date coronavirus information in their area, as well as a symptom checker and suggestions if users are bored in lockdown.

name: Tradewise
desc: A simple and easy to use platform for customers to find a tradesman for any given household job. The site also allows tradesmen to connect with customers.

name: Workday Scheduler
desc: A work day scheduler with time blocks that change colour depending on if the time is in the past, present, or future.

name: Employee Directory
desc: A React App that allows the user to view an employee directory, and sort and filter it.

name: Workout Tracker
desc: An app for users to view and track their daily workouts.

name: Budget Tracker
desc: A site that allows users to add expenses and deposits to their budget, even without an internet connection.
